title: Readfield Meats, Inc. Recalls Beef Trimming Products Due to Possible Adulteration
summary: WASHINGTON, May 27, 2017 Readfield Meats, Inc., doing business as Ruffino Meats & Food Service, a Bryan, Texas establishment, is recalling approximately 45,985 pounds of beef trimming products due to possible adulteration, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) announced today...

establishment.name: Readfield Meats, Inc.
establishment.address:
2130 East William Joel Bryan Parkway 
  Bryan, TX 77802

impacted_products: 50-lb. boxes containing “BEEF TRIMMINGS FOR COOKING ONLY.”
